titles.title: Recognizing that cancer patients have the right to receive care that ensures effective prevention, early diagnosis, improved outcomes, optimal patient rehabilitation, and affordable health care.
Recognizing that cancer patients have the right to receive care that ensures effective prevention, early diagnosis, improved outcomes, optimal patient rehabilitation, and affordable health care.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the right of cancer patients to access quality care, including the latest treatments and multidisciplinary care.
